remarks.note:
Prototype requests, which start with _p, are used to test new functionality.
Once the functionality is tested and ready for production, it is moved to the proper Core/Module class, and is depreciated here.
In general, prototype code is not removed.

Code.remarks:
The current list of prototype requests:
Prototype request Description
_pDocSysCodeDenyAccessToForm Deny access to speicific forms for the DOC System Code.

ClassDescription.remarks: This class determines where prototype requests should be sent.
